contentrichtext.text: {{refimprove|date=January 2013}} {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Zomergem |picture= |picture-legend= |map=MnpZomergemLocation1.png |map-legend=Location of Zomergem in East Flanders |arms=Zomergem wapen.gif |flag=Flag of Zomergem.svg |region={{BE-REG-FLE}} |community={{BE-NL}} |province={{BE-PROV-OV}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Ghent|Ghent]] |nis=44080 |pyramid-date= |0-19= |20-64= |65= |foreigners= |foreigners-date= |mayor=Jo De Coninck |majority=[[Flemish Liberals and Democrats|VLD]], [[Groen!]]-[[sp.a]] |postal-codes=9930-9932 |telephone-area=09 |web=[http://www.zomergem.be/ www.zomergem.be] |lat_deg=51 |lat_min=07 |lon_deg=03 |lon_min=33 }} '''Zomergem''' is a [[municipality]] located in the [[Flanders]] and in the province of [[East Flanders]], in [[Belgium]]. The municipality comprises the towns of [[Oostwinkel]], [[Ronsele]] and Zomergem proper. On January 1, 2006 Zomergem had a total population of 8,011. The total area is 38.78 km² which gives a [[population density]] of 207 inhabitants per km². == Gallery == <gallery> Image:Zomergem, kerk positie2 foto9 2011-10-03 11.40.JPG|Zomergem, church: de Sint-Martinuskerk Image:Zomergem, monumentaal pand foto8 2011-10-03 11.44.JPG|Zomergem, townhall </gallery> ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.zomergem.be Official website ] {{nl icon}} {{East_Flanders}} [[Category:Municipalities of East Flanders]] {{EastFlanders-geo-stub}}
